definition: to meet by chance/to come across/(of a calendar event) to come along/(of an event) to fall on (a particular day)/to fawn upon

sentences.english: When something sensational happens to us, sharing the happiness of the occasion with friends intensifies our joy.
sentences.chinese: 欣逢喜事，与朋友分享其乐，喜上加喜。

definition: (formal) birthday/anniversary of the founding of an organization
to write a poem using another poem's rhymes
the last days of the year/old age
just at that time/as it happens/by good luck, just then

reply to a poem in the same rhyme
